chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 12 mini has the above problem:
my device was ordered on June 1, 2024, but it's never been sent.
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

here the message from the customer:

I unfortunately had to realize that the cable and the adapter of my cell phone arrived damaged, would it be okay to get a replacement?

Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear BackCare, please relay the following message to the customer.

We apologise for the inconvenience caused. Rather than sending a replacement, would you consider a 10 euros commercial gesture instead to save the harmful carbon dioxide emissions generated by logistics carriers to facilitate a shipment of the replacements for the accessories?

Regards,
AS

Dear ecomobile

Good morning,

The goodwill for the complete charger is €25.00.

The customer would like a replacement, could you please send the customer a replacement charger and send me the tracking number.
Thank you very much


Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, we do not provide chargers anymore as ditching the charger is supposed to reduce carbon emissions and preserve raw materials. We only provide cables to the customer along with the phone, hence we are offering a 10 euros commercial gesture. Kindly ask the customer if they are willing to accept this offer because we currently have no extra cables to send out at the moment.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

Thank you for your feedback.

I will be happy to credit the customer €25.00 at your expense


Regards,
Fatma from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

As stated above, we do not provide chargers anymore to reduce carbon emissions and preserve raw materials. As per our contract with BackMarket, we are obligated to provide only the device and a charging cable. Hence, we only provide cables to the customer along with the phone, and can only offer a 10 euros commercial gesture for the damaged cable. Kindly ask the customer if they are willing to accept this offer as we currently have no extra cables to send out at the moment.

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile

A charger is not required according to Back Market, but you have sent it to the customer, so it is now included in the current scope of delivery. Accordingly, we will refund 25 euros. 

If you have any questions, please contact the SSC. Thank you.

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team
